actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider selection logic to automatically failover to alternate LLM providers when error rates or latency thresholds are exceeded.
implementation_steps: Create a new module (circuitBreaker.js) implementing the circuit breaker logic (open/half-open/closed states, error/latency thresholds).
Integrate the circuit breaker into providerManager.js to wrap provider calls.
Update providers.js API endpoints to use the new failover logic.
Add unit tests for failover scenarios.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach a unique correlation ID to each incoming request and propagate it through backend services for improved traceability and debugging.
implementation_steps: Update requestLogger.js middleware to generate and attach a correlation ID to each request (e.g., using uuid).
Ensure correlation ID is included in logs and passed to downstream service calls.
Update tracing.js utilities to support correlation ID propagation.
Test with sample requests and verify logs.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage for critical backend modules, focusing on provider switching and chat pipeline logic.
implementation_steps: Identify untested code paths in provider switching and chat pipeline modules.
Write new Jest test cases to cover edge cases and error handling.
Run tests and ensure all pass.

actionable_tasks.title: Optimize Dockerfile for Multi-Stage Builds
actionable_tasks.description: Refactor the existing Dockerfile(s) to use multi-stage builds, reducing final image size and improving build caching for faster CI/CD.
implementation_steps: Refactor Dockerfile to separate build and runtime stages.
Move dependencies and build artifacts to appropriate stages.
Test local build and run to verify functionality.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement MongoDB TTL Index for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Add a TTL (Time-To-Live) index to the MongoDB telemetry collection to automatically expire old telemetry documents and manage storage.
implementation_steps: Update initIndexes.js to create a TTL index on the telemetry collection (e.g., expireAfterSeconds: 604800 for 7 days).
Test index creation and document expiration locally.
Document the change in the developer README.
